text: Hey! Does anybody know how improve the performance for Core Web Vitals at Google Search Console? Thanks in advance :D
it uses pagespeed insights (which uses google’s lighthouse). Biggest thing I’ve seen that impacts the search console is poor CLS (comulative layout shift).
a lot of times its just because of CTAs taking a long time to load or images that don’t have the width/height attributes so they shift the layout as each image loads on the page

Hi, any idea why I get
```[ERROR] internal error
[ERROR] 'cta' is a restricted field type```
when uploading fields.json ? The module was generated on HubSpot and downloaded using hs fetch

Actually now I can’t upload modules. For example I have this:
```{
    "id" : "card.name",
    "name" : "person_name",
    "label" : "Name",
    "required" : false,
    "locked" : false,
    "validation_regex" : "",
    "allow_new_line" : false,
    "show_emoji_picker" : false,
    "type" : "text",
    "default" : "John Doe"
  }```
and I get
```[ERROR] internal error
[ERROR] 'text' is a restricted field type```
Any idea why? Thanks!
I've problems with CLS and LCP. I've try to include lazy loading for images and clean up the Css. I'll try to include the tags for width and height for the images. Thanks for the help ;)
